attributes.action:
Ban Springwatch presenters from using endless innuendos.
Autumn and Winter too.
attributes.additional_details:
Winterwatch, end of broadcast 26 Jan 15.
Well documented previous examples available online. Every episode has some element of innuendo verging on profanity. Like a 1970"s soft porn film at times.
Unacceptable.
attributes.background: Constant innuendo verging on profanity that detracts from inclusivity in learning and development in a pre watershed broadcast.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is an editorial decision for the BBC.

The BBC Trust are responsible for dealing with complaints from viewers. You can find out more here:

http://www.bbc.co.uk/bbctrust/contact_us/making_a_complaint
